title: Lynda - Office 365 Essential Training: Outlook
description:

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 49m Beginner Sep 22, 2015 | Uploaded in Nov 2, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Business Education + Elearning 
Software: Outlook Office 365 
Author: Jess Stratton 

Learn how to set up and manage email, calendars, and contacts in the Office 365 version of Outlook. This course begins with a tour of the interface and shows how to connect to a wide variety of email accounts, as well as OneDrive for online file storage. Author Jess Stratton then shows how to quickly create, send, and read email and reduce your inbox clutter; organize, group, and share contacts; and stay on schedule with calendars and tasks. Plus, learn how to back up your Outlook data in case you need to restore or move it to a different machine.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Connecting accounts: Exchange, Office 365, IMAP, and POP
	â€¢	Searching for mail
	â€¢	Saving attachments
	â€¢	Organizing mail with flags and folders
	â€¢	Creating new messages
	â€¢	Working with contacts in the People hub
	â€¢	Adding delegates to act on your behalf
	â€¢	Creating meetings
	â€¢	Creating tasks and notes
	â€¢	Backing up and moving Outlook data
